name: Grapple Knight
blurb: Slide, swing and grapple your way through a myriad of ravenous environments to save the day in this retro inspired 2D platformer.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Thank You\r\n==============================\r\nWe will be forever indebted to you for sparing what you could to help get this project off the ground.

Digital Copy of the Game
==============================
A DRM free digital copy of the game for either PC, Mac or Linux.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Steam keys will be available as an alternative in the event that the game is greenlit so don't forget to vote!
Digital Instruction Booklet\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous eligible reward levels + A digital retro instruction booklet for the game in PDF format.

$$$$ EARLY BIRD: Extra Copy $$$$$
==============================
A special stand alone early bird tier! Receive all previous eligible reward levels + A second DRM free digital copy of the game or Steam key to give away as a gift for half price.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
This extra copy reward is only available at this tier level.

Digital Art Book\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous eligible reward levels + A digital art book filled with art and bios from the game along with character concepts and alternative character designs from early iterations of the game.

Digital Soundtrack\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous eligible reward levels + The complete digital soundtrack to the game including some of the bonus tracks that didn\u2019t make it into the final release.

Printed Instruction Booklet
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + High quality printed retro instruction booklet for the game.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The digital instruction booklet reward level will still be included.

Sprite Head & Special Thanks
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + A Red Knight Games style sprite rendition of your face for you to keep and use as you wish.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
We will also place your name or gamertag alongside your sprite face on the websites thank you wall!

Beta Build Access & Dev Forum
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + Access to our periodic beta builds and a private developer forum.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
You will get to mess around with new stages, enemies and game mechanics as we begin to experiment with them. Submit your feedback on how these elements should play together and whether or not you would want them in the final release of your game. Shape the path the game takes and make it the best it can be.

$$$$$$$ All Digital! No Skin $$$$$$$
==============================
A special stand alone tier! You will receive every piece of game related digital content that isn't considered a stand alone tier, except for the custom character skin, this bundle also nets you a small discount on the combined value of the items!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The itemised inclusions for this reward are: a digital copy of the game, the digital instruction booklet, digital art book, digital soundtrack, sprite head, beta access and a full sprite body! This special bundle is only available at this tier level.

Sprite Body
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + A pixel avatar of your entire body created in the style of the Red Knight Games team sprites for you to keep and use as you wish.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
You will receive a standard avatar sized PNG at 1 to 1 resolution, as well as a high resolution print ready vector file.

$$$$$ All Physical Rewards 2 $$$$$$
==============================
A special stand alone tier! You will receive every physical item available that isn't considered a stand alone tier, which includes the much sought after physical game box and now also includes an exclusive USB SNES controller! This will net you a HUGE discount on the combined value of the items!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The itemised inclusions for this reward are: a retro style physical game box, a digital copy of the game and soundtrack stored on a physical medium, the printed instruction manual, printed art book, a USB SNES controller and a printed A1 size game poster! This special bundle is only available at this tier level.

$$$$$$ All Physical Rewards $$$$$$$
==============================
A special stand alone tier! You will receive every physical item available that isn't considered a stand alone tier, which includes the much sought after physical game box! This will net you a huge discount on the combined value of the items!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The itemised inclusions for this reward are: a retro style physical game box, a digital copy of the game and soundtrack stored on a physical medium, the printed instruction manual, printed art book and a printed A1 size game poster! This special bundle is only available at this tier level.

Design Hangout\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous eligible reward levels + You will get to join us over a Skype call or Google Hangout for an entire day to sit in on and contribute to our design meetings and gameplay brainstorming sessions. You will also get to see first hand how the art and levels for Grapple Knight are created via screen sharing!

$$$$$ Adventure Knight Poster $$$$$
==============================
A special stand alone tier! You will receive a limited edition watercolour poster for Grapple Knight, painted by artist Andy Garner-Flexner, a Production Assistant on Adventure Time! Each poster will be a unique, signed and numbered work in a very limited run of amazing artworks and bundled with some of our awesome digital essentials!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The itemised inclusions for this reward are: A super A3 watercolour poster, a digital copy of the game, digital instruction manual, digital art book and the digital soundtrack! This special bundle is only available at this tier level.

$$$$$$$ Your Face in Game $$$$$$$
==============================
A special stand alone tier! You will receive all previous eligible reward levels + Your pixel face will make a cameo somewhere within the game. A painting of a noble within the castle walls? Perhaps a poor villager that was turned into a tree? The possibilities are endless.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
You will also receive an in game credit for your likeness! This special reward is only available at this tier level.

Printed Poster & Digital Wallpapers
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + A printed and signed A1 poster of the finished game cover art
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
We will also include an official Grapple Knight digital wallpaper for you to enjoy while you wait for your poster to arrive!

Printed Art Book
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + A high quality printed glossy art book so that you can enjoy the tactile and collectable sensation of Grapple Knight's amazing concept art, character designs and bios!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The digital art book reward level will still be included.

Boxed Copy of the Game
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + A physical retro style box for the game, along with an embedded physical storage medium containing your copy of Grapple Knight!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
You will receive a limited edition 16-bit style box for the game complete with printed front and back slip, along with a copy of the game stored in the box. Also perfect for holding your printed instruction manual!

Director for a Day
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + You get to be director for a day, sign off on character and enemy designs as well as work with us to balance and brainstorm game mechanics and boss battles.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Any decisions made need to be within the games original theme and scope, so nothing crazy or offensive. You will also receive an assistant designer credit in the game!

$$$$$$$$ You as an NPC $$$$$$$$$
==============================
A special stand alone tier! You will receive all previous eligible reward levels + We will work with you to turn your likeness into an in game NPC!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Choose from the pool of available powers and we will then work to define your NPC's look based on your personality. The gifts that you bestow on the player will be available at the various warrior shrines throughout the game. The list of powers to choose from is on a first come first serve basis.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
You will also receive an in game credit for your ghostly likeness! This special reward is only available at this tier level.

$$$$ All Digital Content Rewards $$$$
==============================
A special stand alone tier! You will receive every digital item available that isn't considered a stand alone tier, which includes the amazing custom hero skin! This will net you a huge discount on the combined value of the items! :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
The itemised inclusions for this reward are: a digital copy of the game, the digital instruction booklet, digital art book, digital soundtrack, sprite head, beta access, a full sprite body and a custom hero skin for your character! This special bundle is only available at this tier level.

Custom Hero Skin
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + We will take your full body pixel likeness and turn you into a custom skin for the main character, complete with character portrait for dialogue!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Perform every move that Jouren is capable of as you look to defeat the evil alchemist. Your character skin will be unlockable for all to enjoy by completing various in game tasks and challenges, but we will give you an unlock code so that you can play in your custom skin from day one!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
You will also receive an "elite backer" in game credit for your likeness!

Hang Out With the Devs
==============================
All previous eligible reward levels + Hang out with the developers of Grapple Knight for a few days. Watch movies, play games and eat junk food with us!
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
We will wine and dine you, as well as take you out to some of our local game dev meet ups where you will be able to hangout with some of the other great developers in the Australian indie scene.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Travel and accommodation are not included.
